headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ISRAEL, GLORIA (NEE RAND)

snippet: ISRAEL--Gloria (nee Rand), January 20, 2016. Wife of the late Norman Israel. Mother of Nina Israel Zucker and Adam Israel. Survived by five grandchildren. Services and burial in Cherry Hill, NJ. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ISRAEL--Gloria (nee Rand), January 20, 2016. Wife of the late Norman Israel. Mother of Nina Israel Zucker and Adam Israel. Survived by five grandchildren. Services and burial in Cherry Hill, NJ. 1/3
